All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice-president of engineering and research. Kirsten Gillibrand focused her attention on two issues-cybersecurity and the hoarding of rare earth elements( REEs)- where she feels the Chinese are behaving inappropriately. Cybersecurity and REEs greatly affect both the national and economic security of the United States, and I continue to be concerned about China's policies regarding these two strategic interests, she wrote in her letter.
